title: Provides reimbursement to licensed not-for-profit corporations providing the office of mental retardation and developmental disabilities services for retirement cost
summary: Provides for the annual reimbursement to licensed not-for-profit corporations which provide direct care to consumers approved for service by the office of metal retardation and developmental disabilities for the cost of employer contributions to a retirement benefit fund governed by the provisions of the Federal Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to retirement benefits for certain direct care workers employed by not-for-profit office of mental retardation and developmental disabilities providers
